meanings.definition: A polygon with seven sides and seven angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew a heptagon in my math class today.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a colorful heptagon drawn on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The heptagon decided to throw a party for all the other shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a heptagon of complex thoughts, each side representing a different idea.
meanings.sent5: The heptagon's sharp angles made it stand out among the other shapes.

meanings.sent1: The cake was baked in the form of a heptagon.
meanings.sent2: The garden had a beautiful fountain in the shape of a heptagon.
meanings.sent3: The heptagon rolled down the hill, much to the surprise of the other shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were a heptagon of wonder, reflecting the beauty of the world.
meanings.sent5: The heptagon's symmetry made it a pleasing sight to behold.
